function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of school closures on families and economic costs","Impact":"Loss of income, reduced workforce productivity, and economic impact at both local and national levels","Mitigation":"Support for families affected by closures, provision of remote work options, and economic stimulus to counteract financial losses","Technologies":"Remote learning and work technologies, economic modeling tools","People":"Families, students, and workers","Owner":"Government, employers, and educational institutions"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on research community","Impact":"Halt in non-COVID-related research, redirection of resources, and impact on professional development","Mitigation":"Support for affected researchers, prioritization of critical research, and support for remote research activities","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, research funding allocation tools","People":"Researchers, academic staff, and research institutions","Owner":"Research funding bodies and institutions"}]}
